member.name: T:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extensions to Flurl objects that use Newtonsoft.Json.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.GetJsonAsync(Flurl.Http.IFlurlResponse)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON-formatted HTTP response body to a dynamic object.
member.returns: A Task whose result is a dynamic object containing data in the response body.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.GetJsonListAsync(Flurl.Http.IFlurlResponse)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON-formatted HTTP response body to a list of dynamic objects.
member.returns: A Task whose result is a list of dynamic objects containing data in the response body.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.ReceiveJson(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{Flurl.Http.IFlurlResponse})
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON-formatted HTTP response body to a dynamic object. Intended to chain off an async call.
member.returns: A Task whose result is a dynamic object containing data in the response body.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.ReceiveJsonList(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{Flurl.Http.IFlurlResponse})
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON-formatted HTTP response body to a list of dynamic objects. Intended to chain off an async call.
member.returns: A Task whose result is a list of dynamic objects containing data in the response body.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.GetResponseJsonAsync(Flurl.Http.FlurlHttpException)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON-formatted error response body to a dynamic object.
member.returns: A Task whose result is a dynamic object containing data in the response body.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.UseNewtonsoft(Flurl.Http.Configuration.IFlurlClientBuilder,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Shortcut to use NewtonsoftJsonSerializer with this IFlurlClientBuilder.
member.param: This IFlurlClientBuilder.
Optional custom JsonSerializerSettings.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.ExtensionMethods.UseNewtonsoft(Flurl.Http.Configuration.IFlurlClientCache,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Shortcut to use NewtonsoftJsonSerializer with all FlurlClients registered in this cache.
member.param: This IFlurlClientCache.
Optional custom JsonSerializerSettings.

member.name: T:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.GeneratedExtensions
member.summary: Fluent extension methods on String, Url, Uri, and IFlurlRequest.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.GeneratedExtensions.GetJsonAsync(Flurl.Http.IFlurlRequest,System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends an asynchronous GET request.
member.param: This IFlurlRequest
The HttpCompletionOption used in the request. Optional.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A Task whose result is the JSON response body deserialized to a dynamic.

member.name: T:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.NewtonsoftJsonSerializer
member.summary: ISerializer implementation based on Newtonsoft.Json. Default serializer used in calls to GetJsonAsync, PostJsonAsync, etc.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.NewtonsoftJsonSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Settings to control (de)serialization behavior.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.NewtonsoftJsonSerializer.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string.
member.param: The object to serialize.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.NewtonsoftJsonSerializer.Deserialize``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified JSON string to an object of type T.
member.param: The JSON string to deserialize.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Newtonsoft.NewtonsoftJsonSerializer.Deserialize``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified stream to an object of type T.
member.param: The stream to deserialize.
